Keeping Busy

Posted on March 11, 2025

Haskell

{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
module Main where

import Text.Printf

main :: IO ()
main = do 
    (name:) <- getArgs
    printf "Hello, %s" name

Python

import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    name = sys.argv[0]
    print(f"Hello, {name}!")

C

#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
  printf("Hello, %s!", argv[1]);

  return 0;
}
